A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I made an RT profile for the first time specifically because of how awful this movie. It's laughably bad. Hollywood should stop allow people to write and direct their own movies. You wind up with this garbage. I at least hope the complete lack of any complexity to the writing and total lack of subtext was a choice so they could translate it into other languages easier. Seems like something Disney would do... sacrifice the integrity of Star Wars to make a quick buck. Thanks Disney.
